content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft a stone_sword, I need to craft a stick, which in turn requires crafting warped_planks. To craft warped_planks, I need to place 1 stripped_warped_hyphae in the crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move the stripped_warped_hyphae from slot 30 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I can craft the warped_planks by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a stick, I need to place 1 warped_planks in the crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move the warped_planks from slot 11 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 19}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}]

thought: Since the cobblestone has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the blackstone to the right of it. Slot 4 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the blackstone to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 7 with quantity 1
